Palette Class Reference
[Graphics rendering library]

#include <Palette.h>

Inheritance diagram for Palette:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for platform dependent palettes.


Public Member Functions

virtual int entries () const=0
 Returns number of entries in the palette.
virtual void getEntries (int index, void *data, const SurfaceFormat &fmt, int count)=0
 Gets palette entries.
virtual void setEntries (int index, const void *data, const SurfaceFormat &fmt, int count)=0
 Sets palette entries.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Palette::getEntries ( int  index,
void *  data,
const SurfaceFormat &  fmt,
int  count 
) [pure virtual]

Gets palette entries.

Palette must be locked for reading before this method can be called.

Parameters:
index First palette entry to get.
data Pointer to palette data.
fmt Palette pixel format.
count Number of entries to get.

virtual void Palette::setEntries ( int  index,
const void *  data,
const SurfaceFormat &  fmt,
int  count 
) [pure virtual]

Sets palette entries.

Palette must be locked for writing before this method can be called.

Parameters:
index First palette entry to set.
data Pointer to palette source data.
fmt Source pixel format.
count Number of entries to set.
